content.name: clock
content.label: Clock
content.gloss: a mechanical or electrical device for measuring time, indicating hours, minutes, and sometimes seconds, typically by hands on a round dial or by displayed figures

content.name: normal_clock
content.label: Normal Clock
content.gloss: a normal clock without pendulum or other complicated decoration

content.name: digital_clock
content.label: Digital Clock
content.gloss: digital clock with screen

content.name: pendulum_clock
content.label: Pendulum Clock
content.gloss: a clock that uses a pendulum, a swinging weight, as its timekeeping element

content.name: base
content.label: Base
content.gloss: base (support part) of the clock

content.name: pendulum_clock_base
content.label: Pendulum Clock Base
content.gloss: base (support part) of the clock

content.name: frame
content.label: Frame
content.gloss: frame around the main clock part (usually circular)

content.name: clock_body
content.label: Clock Body
content.gloss: main clock body

content.name: pendulum_clock_frame
content.label: Pendulum Clock Frame
content.gloss: outside frame part of the pendulum clock

content.name: door
content.label: Door
content.gloss: the door that we open to see the clock inside

content.name: door_surface
content.label: Door Surface
content.gloss: Surface forming the clock frame door

content.name: box
content.label: Box
content.gloss: the clock main box, except for door and supporting bars

content.name: hinge
content.label: Hinge
content.gloss: a joint that holds two parts together so that one can swing relative to the other

content.name: handle
content.label: Handle
content.gloss: the appendage to an object that is designed to be held in order to use or move it

content.name: support_bar
content.label: Support Bar
content.gloss: a supporting bar

content.name: pendulum_clock_top
content.label: Pendulum Clock Top
content.gloss: the top decoration part of the pendulum clock

content.name: pendulum
content.label: Pendulum
content.gloss: the pendulum part of the pendulum clock

content.name: foot_base
content.label: Foot Base
content.gloss: foot style base

content.name: hanging_base
content.label: Hanging Base
content.gloss: the clock body is supported by the base by hanging

content.name: alarm
content.label: Alarm Part
content.gloss: Alarm part

content.name: alarm_ring
content.label: Alarm Ring
content.gloss: Alarm Ring

content.name: alarm_connector
content.label: Alarm Connector
content.gloss: Alarm Connector

content.name: hand
content.label: Hand
content.gloss: hand on the clock

content.name: surface
content.label: Surface
content.gloss: surface of the clock

content.name: screen
content.label: Screen
content.gloss: screen of the digital clock

content.name: button
content.label: Button
content.gloss: button on the panel of the digital clock

content.name: surface_base
content.label: Surface Base
content.gloss: surface base

content.name: pendulum_body
content.label: Pendulum Body
content.gloss: main body of the pendulum

content.name: weights
content.label: Weights
content.gloss: weights of the pendulum

content.name: chain
content.label: Chain
content.gloss: chain of the pendulum

content.name: glass
content.label: Glass
content.gloss: the glass surface above the clock

content.name: watch
content.label: Watch
content.gloss: a small timepiece worn typically on a strap on one's wrist

content.name: strap
content.label: Strap
content.gloss: the strap of the watch for fastening

content.name: watch_body
content.label: Watch Body
content.gloss: the main body of the watch

content.name: lug
content.label: Lug
content.gloss: lug (connector of the main body and the strap)

content.name: crown
content.label: Crown
content.gloss: crown for adjusting the time or date

content.name: foot
content.label: Foot
content.gloss: a support resembling a pedal extremity

content.name: base_support
content.label: Base Support
content.gloss: a supporting structure for clock base

content.name: base_surface
content.label: Base Surface
content.gloss: the surface base that touches the ground or table
